sameAnalysis.word_list: always, often, usually, frequently, repeatedly, regularly
means: always ：总是，永远。语气最强，指在一切时候，没有例外。
often ：经常，语气弱于always,侧重动作发生的次数具有经常性，具体时间意味不强。
usually ：通常，通例地，指习惯性动作，频度仅次于always，较often大，偶尔有间隔。
frequently ：时常，经常，与often同义，可通用，但较正式，强调次数频繁。
repeatedly ：屡次，强调次数多，但反复的频率不一定均匀。
regularly ：用于修饰经常而有规律性的动作。

sentence.Network_en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

sentence.Network_en: The ideological divisions between the parties aren't always obvious.
sentence.Network_cn: 政党之间的意识形态界线并不总是泾渭分明的。

sentence.Network_en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentence.Network_cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 〖all〗 一刬都是新的 〖always〗 总是;一味 〖futile;allinvain〗 一倡百和.
仁爱英语七年级下册单词_百度文库 ... subway 地下铁道，地铁交通 always 总是，一直，永远 come on 快点儿，加油，来吧.
仁爱英语七年级下册单词_百度文库 ... subway 地下铁道，地铁交通 always 总是，一直，永远 come on 快点儿，加油，来吧.
King Always是什么意思呀_百度知道 ... king = 王 always = 总 king always = 王总.

list.abs: yeah , whenever I stay with you I always have a sense of warm !, 嗯 , 当我跟你在一起的时候我总是有一种温暖的感觉!
the loop of time I always fear ?, 你的世界知道我一直害怕的时间的循环吗.
why do they always give advice ., 为什么他们总是给出建议.
典范英语5-8总结 - 豆丁网 ... break into 闯入； as always 一如既往； spring into action 立即采取行动；.
you always wrote the material for your shows ., 你总是为你的表演写材料.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : genitive case of all way, the inflection probably giving the sense 'at every time' as opposed to 'at one uninterrupted time': the difference between the two is no longer distinct

encyclopedia.content: 单曲简介 专辑名称：Always 演唱歌手：中岛美嘉 发行公司：SMA 发行日期：2010年01月20日 语言种类：日语 专辑介绍： 继“Orion”之後，中岛美嘉的新作“ALWAYS”再度由新进音乐人百田留衣操刀。哀伤的歌词描写爱上不该爱的人的心痛，歌曲也是中山美穗睽违12年再度主演的电影《总有一天说再见》的主题曲。另收入“BABY BABY BABY”和“SPIRAL”。 专辑曲目： 1.ALWAYS 2.BABY BABY BABY 3.SPIRAL 4.ALWAYS (Instrumental) 5.BABY

entry.tran: 总是；每次都是；无例外地
entry.def: If you always do something, you do it whenever a particular situation occurs. If you always did something, you did it whenever a particular situation occurred.

example.ex: Whenever I get into a relationship, I always fall madly in love...
example.tran: 我每次谈恋爱都深陷其中，无法自拔。

entry.def: If something is always the case, was always the case, or will always be the case, it is, was, or will be the case all the time, continuously.

example.ex: We will always remember his generous hospitality...
example.tran: 我们将永远记得他的慷慨好客。

example.ex: He has always been the family solicitor...
example.tran: 他一直做家庭事务律师。

entry.def: If you say that something is always happening, especially something which annoys you, you mean that it happens repeatedly.

example.ex: She was always moving things around.
example.tran: 她老是将东西搬来搬去。

entry.tran: （用于提出建议或提示其他解决方法）总还，总还是
entry.def: You use always in expressions such as can always or could always when you are making suggestions or suggesting an alternative approach or method.

example.ex: If you can't find any decent apples, you can always try growing them yourself...
example.tran: 如果你找不到像样的苹果，你总还可以试着自己种。

example.ex: 'What are you going to do?' — 'I don't know. I could always go back in the Navy or something.'
example.tran: “你打算做什么？”——“不知道，我总还是能回到海军或者什么的。”

entry.def: You can say that someone always was, for example, awkward or lucky to indicate that you are not surprised about what they are doing or have just done.

example.ex: She's going to be fine. She always was pretty strong...
example.tran: 她会好的。她一直都很强壮。

example.ex: You always were a good friend.
example.tran: 你从来都是我的好朋友。

means.word_mean: 1. at all times; all the time and on every occasion;

sentences.sentence: "I will always be there to help you"
"there is always some pollution in the air"

means.word_mean: 2. seemingly without interruption; often and repeatedly;
3. at any time or in any event;

sentences.sentence: "you can always resign if you don't like it"
"you could always take a day off"

auth_sentence.content: I'd always done a lot of stills photography.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd always done a lot of stills photography.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd always done a lot of stills photography.

auth_sentence.content: I've always been a staunch supporter - always.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've always been a staunch supporter - always.

auth_sentence.content: However, he wasn't always confident of success.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, he wasn't always confident of success.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, he wasn't always confident of success.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表副词,"方向,状态",也可表形容词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 向旁边[的],侧身,横着[的],斜着[的]
stems_affixes.word_buile: side边+ways方向,状态→向旁边地[的]
al全部+ways方向,状态→全部都是这个状态→总是,永远,始终
end末端+ways方向,状态→adv.末端向前地

means.word_mean: 总是; 每次都是;  一直; 一贯; 无例外地; （将）永远

sentences.en: You've always been my close friend.
sentences.cn: 你一直是我亲密的朋友。

sentences.en: My little daughter is always bothering me when I'm at work.
sentences.cn: 我工作时, 我的小女儿老爱打扰我。

sentences.en: Freddie almost[nearly] always goes to town on Sunday nights.
sentences.cn: 弗雷迪几乎每星期天晚上都进城。

jushi.english: She was always asking for money.
He always acted up to the principle he set for himself.
jushi.chinese: 他总是遵循自己所定的原则。

jushi.english: The good and the beautiful do not always go together.
